title: XDM Graph Node/Vertex Schema
description: XDM Schema for a graph Node/Vertex.

xdm:nodeId.title: Node Identifier
xdm:nodeId.description: The unique identifier of the identity associated with this graph node.

xdm:firstSeenTimestamp.title: Node First Seen Date And Time
xdm:firstSeenTimestamp.description: Time and date this node was first seen.

xdm:lastSeenTimestamp.title: Node Last Seen Date And Time
xdm:lastSeenTimestamp.description: Time and date this node was last seen.

xdm:firstCreateTimestamp.title: Node Created Date And Time
xdm:firstCreateTimestamp.description: Time and date this node was first created.

xdm:lastModifiedTimestamp.title: Node Last Modified Date And Time
xdm:lastModifiedTimestamp.description: Time and date this node was last modified.
